resources.string: Ringtone Widgets lets you quickly switch between ring, vibrate, and silent modes right from your home screen, using minimalist widgets.

Due to Android restrictions, the widgets cannot enable the system’s “silent” mode. Instead, they rely on Do Not Disturb (DND).\nAlso, the widget’s state will not automatically update if the mode is changed elsewhere. This is normal and expected behavior.
Thank you for using Ringtone Widgets!
To enable Silent Mode, you must allow Do Not Disturb.
